column4: guest access checkbox is greyed out when i try to share a folder in hardy, how can i enable it?
I guess IdleOne was being ironic - you should repeat your question only after 10~15 minutes please
thanks for defining 'quickly' for me
:-) - I'm not defining anything - but otherwise the channel becomes even more busy - good luck to you
thank you
are you trying to share a folder from your home directory?
yes
silly question: you did enable "share this folder"?
yes, i did; it works in jaunty, but not in hardy :(
next try: is this just for one folder so or for everyone?
everyone, even for users that have admin privileges
i think i will add samba users, but it's not nice having to enter password all the time...
my question should have been: is this a problem with one particular folder or for every folder
i have tried it with several different folders (also of different users) and neither worked, which implies that it is the case with every folde
I'm afraid you are right (didn't know your experience :-)), as I don't have access to a 8.04 at the moment - I have to give up, sorry
i appreciate your taking time to this
good luck
startupmanager does not have services
